No way to update your PCs programm with this file.

Works on the iPad perfectly.

Not sure how FliteMap / FliteStar updates will be done these days - as the old trick of renaming CD2 doesn't work with the new update DVDs.

Am still hoping someone manages to figure it out - as I love tinkering with FliteMap!

It seems we are two teams now, 
1. The ones who only need update for the iPad (FD/TC)
2. The ones who need update for PC (Flitestar)

This is a challenge for the uploaders, 
Personally i think the way it has been done so far, with the PC version (2x image files) and codes have been great, as it works good on borth platform with less effort from the uploaders. Just uploading an update for the iPad leaves ther Flitestar users out. 

Keep up the good work guys and thanks for all the great uploads !!!

How do we check which cycle is it? I mean can we check on our Ipad the cycle we are using?

1.Disconnect Internet
2.Set computer clock for Jan 10, 2009
3.select both Jeppview and Flitedeck programs
4.use as name : PILOTS
5.use serial : VNX1-IBYH-E5K1-7G8F ( this will give you Full Worldwide access )

now you need the other two CDs.
you MUST get version 01/2009

install CD1 using following 2 serials:

for VFR Europe : 217AN22318
for Full Worldwide : 217AN22319

install CD2 (no serial here...)

6.Do not reboot
7.Run Jeppview or Flitedeck
8.Program prompts for 30-day free use or Activation
9.press NEXT
10.Select "by phone" option and press NEXT
11.use the code R00D-KCAB (r-zero-zero-d) not ROOD (r-o-o-d) !!!!

12. set now the current date on computer clock !!!
